text: Barbara Buczek (9 January 1940 – 17 January 1993) was a Polish composer. She was born in Kraków, Poland. ==Partial list of works== *Mikrosonata for violin solo (1968) *Blaeserquintett (1969) *Anekumena – Concerto for 89 instruments (1974) *Eidos III for bassoon solo (1979) *String Quartet No. 2 Transgressio (1985) *Study No. 1 for flute solo (1990) ==External links== *Biography, photo and list of works (in Polish) Category:1940 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Polish composers Category:20th-century composers Category:Polish women composers
title: Barbara Buczek
